sourcesContent:
import Input from "./components/Input";
import Button from "./components/Button";
import { Container, Content, Row, Column } from "./styles";
import colors from './colors';

const App = () => {
  const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState(0);
  return (
    <Container>
      <Content>
        <Input />
    
        <Row>
      
   
        <Button label="C" color={colors.red}/>
          <Button label="÷" color={colors.primary}  />
      
        </Row>
        <Row>
     
        <Button label="7" />
          <Button label="8" />
          <Button label="9" />
          <Button label="×"  color={colors.primary}  />
        </Row>
        <Row>
        <Button label="4" />
          <Button label="5" />
          <Button label="6" />
          <Button label="−"  color={colors.primary} />
        </Row>
        <Row>
        <Button label="1" />
          <Button label="2" />
          <Button label="3" />
          <Button label="+" color={colors.primary}/>
        </Row>

        <Row>
        <Button label="←" color={colors.primary} />
          <Button label="0" />
          <Button label="," />
          <Button label="="  bgSpecial={colors.primaryGradient} />
        </Row>
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default App;
